text: Georgs Andrejevs (30 October 1932 – 16 July 2022) was a Latvian politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament for the Latvian Way party from 2004 to 2009. He was the Foreign Minister of Latvia from 1992 to 1994. He was born in Tukums, Latvia. Andrejevs died on 16 July 2022 in Riga, Latvia at the age of 89.Mūžībā devies izcilais ārsts un politiķis Georgs Andrejevs ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Latvia
title: Georgs Andrejevs
